name: Binary Choices (Quentin Tang)
description:
Binary Choices is a short game made for Jamforleelah, about questioning gender, stereotypes and the dreaded binary. All of the money you chose to give for the game goes directly to the the Silvia Riviera Law Project, a trans organization. Here's a link to their site if you want to donate that way : http://srlp.org/about/ . Jamforleelah also supports these other two trans-positive associations, here's their links : http://transgenderlawcenter.org/; http://www.camparanutiq.org/

Enjoy the game !

Feel free to give any feedback if you want somehow, i don't know.

This was made in early 2015 I'm reposting it now that I'm finally making a proper itch.io. the triggers sometimes don't work perfectly, but if you believe you'll make your way through.
